div.sent: By this time we have heard of the word disciple many times.
We have also heard of the word Apostle.
But we do not yet know the real meaning of the words.
So we shall now try to learn the real meanings of these words.
Jesus told his disciples, Follow me.
What do we mean by the word follow?
The word follow means to come or go after or behind someone.
Each of them was sent with special divine duty of preaching Jesus's teachings.
Twelve Apostles of Jesus Christ Our Lord Jesus had many disciples.
However he chose only twelve from them.
He sent them to far off places with a special mission.
Their special duty was to preach his messages.
He sent them to preach peace, kindness, love and forgiveness.
Jesus Christ chose his Apostles for some special tasks.
preach messages of Jesus to all men.
ask people to change their mind.
make people have faith in Jesus.
baptise the faithful.
cure human diseases.
drive out the evils from human beings.
look after the Churches of Jesus Christ.
Jesus had twelve Apostles.
At the same time he had many other disciples too.
The disciples were not only men.
Many women also were his disciples.
Jesus also loved them.
Who can be the disciples of Jesus?
All human beings can be his disciples.
We also can be his disciples.
What are the qualities one should have to be his disciple?
The first and foremost quality is faith.
To love God and all men equally is the second quality.
The third one is to serve others.
Those who can do these shall become the disciples of Jesus.
Jesus, we love you.
We obey you as our Saviour.
Make a list of the qualities one should have to become the disciple of Jesus.
